THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The man explaining with garlic in hand visually links to the 'Hidden Benefits of Garlic' in both Hindi and English. The large, bold Hindi text mirrors the video’s premise (benefits/strength metaphor), while showing garlic and an amazed man with a symbolic arrow underscores the dramatic benefit.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: The thumbnail’s wording is somewhat sensationalized ('लोहे जैसा तनाव'), which may not literally match the nuanced, scientific take implied by 'Dr. Imran Khan' in the title—potentially setting higher expectations than the content might fulfill. However, the overall visual tone and subject matter are cohesive with the title.
